results.title: Vitamin B12 Deficiency and Clinical Neuropathy with Metformin Use in Type 2 Diabetes
results.text_hl: The prevalence of @<m>DISEASE_Vitamin_B_12_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014806 @@@vit B12 deficiency@@@ in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and non-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ observed groups was 33.26% and 22.1%, respectively.
